name: Smashbob
description:
Smashbob is an in-development action game based on a blend of physics and arcade elements. Smash your way through enemies and obstacles on your journey to destroy the cores!

This early build of the game is just that: an early build. It has unfinished or filler graphics, only 2 music tracks, one map, and may be glitchy. We are releasing this to get feedback from gamers to help shape the future of Smashbob. Please feel free to give us your thoughts, complaints, and suggestions for the game!
